data.text: “Me ɔsomfoɔ a mahyɛ no den nie,
Ɔrenteam anaa ɔremma ne nne so.
Demmire a ayɛ mmerɛ no, ɔremmu mu.
ɔrenhinhim na nʼabamu remmu
Yei ne deɛ Onyankopɔn, Awurade no seɛ,
“Me, Awurade, mafrɛ wo tenenee mu;
na woabue ani a afira,
“Mene Awurade; me din ne no!
Hwɛ, nneɛma dada no atwam,
Monto dwom foforɔ mma Awurade!
Ma anweatam ne ɛso nkuro mma wɔn nne so;
Ma wɔnhyɛ Awurade animuonyam;
Awurade bɛpue aba sɛ ɔkatakyie,
“Mayɛ komm akyɛre,
Mɛsɛe mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ no
Mɛdi anifirafoɔ anim afa ɛkwan a wɔnnim so,
Na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ahoni so,
“Tie, wo ɔsotifoɔ;
Hwan ne ɔnifirafoɔ sɛ me ɔsomfoɔ,
Woahunu nneɛma bebree, nanso amfa wo ho;
Ɛsɔɔ Awurade ani
Nanso saa nnipa a wɔawia wɔn na wɔafo wɔn yi,
Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛtie yei
Hwan na ɔde Yakob maa sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ korɔnodeɛ,
Enti ɔhwiee nʼabufuhyeɛ guu wɔn so,
